data.title: Indian Literature in Translation IV Semester Material
data.meta_description: Indian Literature in Translation IV Semester Material - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document provides a syllabus for an M.A. in English course on Indian literature in translation. It outlines 5 units that will be covered: 1) Nationalist sentiment and literary movements, 2) Poetry by Gurram Jashuva, Bala Gangadhar Tilak, and Subrahmanya Bharati, 3) Drama by Badal Sarkar, 4) Novels by U.R. Anantha Murthy and Chandu Menon, and 5) Stories by Premchand and G.V. Krishna Rao. It also includes summaries of poems by Bala Gangadhar Tilak and the short story "The Graveyard" by Gurram Jash
